synthesis_conditions.temperature_range: Before 290 째C for coordinated water molecule release, 300 째C to 490 째C for overall frame decomposition
synthesis_conditions.time: 48 hours for immersion in aqueous solutions with different pH
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Stability tested in air for 1 month, and in aqueous solutions with pH 1 and 13. Thermogravimetric analysis traces indicate thermal stability up to 290 째C.

synthesis_conditions.solvent_assisted_ligand_exchange_reactio: Performed to explore the regulation of the conjugation effect on the electronic behavior of ZUT-8. The crystals of ZUT-8(C-C) were immersed in an acetonitrile solution of bpe.

linker_ratio.observation: The 512 nm emission peak gradually appears with increasing bpe content and dominates, changing the luminescence behavior of the powder from blue to yellow-green.

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The substitution reaction is considered a single crystal to single crystal process.
